Package it.polimi.ingsw.model.personalBoard.resourceManager

Class Warehouse

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.personalBoard.resourceManager.Warehouse
public class Warehouse
extends java.lang.Object
Warehouse class represent the depot storage in the personal board

    • removeDepotLeader

      Remove the depot from the list of depot Leader
      Parameters:
      depotToRemove - i want to remove

    • addDepotResourceAt

      public void addDepotResourceAt​(int indexDepot, Resource resource, boolean isNormalDepot) throws TooMuchResourceDepotException, InvalidOrganizationWarehouseException
      Add a resource to a specific depot
      Parameters:
      indexDepot - the index i want to modify
      resource - the resource to sum
      isNormalDepot - true if normal depot false if leader depot
      Throws:
      TooMuchResourceDepotException - if adding too much res in this depot
      InvalidOrganizationWarehouseException - if You try to add a resource type different from his own or if you can't add Type_A because you have those already stored in another depot

    • subDepotResourceAt

      public void subDepotResourceAt​(int indexDepot, Resource resource, boolean isNormalDepot) throws NegativeResourceException, java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException, InvalidOrganizationWarehouseException
      Sub a resource to a specific depot
      Parameters:
      indexDepot - the index i want to modify in the leader depot list
      resource - the resource to sub
      isNormalDepot - true if normal depot false if leader depot
      Throws:
      NegativeResourceException - if try to sub more than i own
      InvalidOrganizationWarehouseException - if You try to add a resource type different from his own or if you can't add Type_A because you have those already stored in another depot
      java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException

    • doIHaveADepotWith

      public boolean doIHaveADepotWith​(ResourceType type)
      Return true if i have a depot with a specific type of resource
      Parameters:
      type - : the type i'm looking at
      Returns:
      true if i already have one, false if i don't

    • popResourceFromDepotAt

      public Resource popResourceFromDepotAt​(int indexDepot, boolean isNormalDepot) throws java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException
      Return and remove the resource from depot
      Parameters:
      indexDepot - of depot i want to empty
      isNormalDepot - true if normal, false if leader
      Returns:
      the resource i took from the index depot
      Throws:
      java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException

    • howManyDoIHave

      public int howManyDoIHave​(ResourceType resourceType)
      Return how many resource of a single type i'm storing in the warehouse(Leader + Normal)
      Parameters:
      resourceType - i want to find
      Returns:
      the value of resourceType i own
